author: Ben Cohen
title: No. 16 UMBC Shocks No. 1 Virginia in Historic NCAA Tournament Upset
text:
It finally happened: a No. 16 seed beat a No. 1 seed in the biggest upset in the history of the NCAA tournament. 
The University of Maryland, Baltimore County beat Virginia, 74-54, becoming the first No.16 team ever to knock off a No. 1 seed on Friday night in a game that will forever be remembered as a classic in college basketball.
